item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, January 7, 2025 at 8:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Tramway SDK – The Unholy Union Between Half-Life and Morrowind Engines (295 points | 84 comments)
2. Physicists Magnetize a Material with Light (53 points | 9 comments)
3. Federal Reserve Bank of NY "Doomsday Book" 2022 via FOIA [pdf] (221 points | 156 comments)

6. Collusion Through Common Leadership – Tech No-Poach Lists [pdf] (80 points | 39 comments)

8. PostgreSQL Support for Certificate Transparency Logs Now Available (14 points | 3 comments)
9. OmniAI (YC W24) Hiring Engineers to Build Open Source Document Extraction ( | hide)
10. Microsoft disguises Bing as Google to fool inattentive searchers (44 points | 20 comments)
11. Building Ultra Long Range Toslink (101 points | 53 comments)
12. A minimax chess engine in regular expressions (436 points | 82 comments)
13. Ask HN: Have you ever seen a pathfinding algorithm of this type? (17 points | 24 comments)

15. Zig's comptime is bonkers good (362 points | 192 comments)

19. Type 2 Diabetes and cardiovascular disease attributable to sugar beverages (36 points | 20 comments)
20. In a cold day of late winter a new search experience came out (9 points | 8 comments)
21. High-resolution genomic history of early medieval Europe (24 points | 5 comments)
22. Preventing conflicts in authoritative DNS config using formal verification (24 points | discuss)
23. Stimulation Clicker (2688 points | 522 comments)
24. Getty Images and Shutterstock to Merge (139 points | 116 comments)
25. Nvidia's Project Digits is a 'personal AI supercomputer' (531 points | 396 comments)
26. A feature-rich Hacker News client (51 points | 26 comments)
27. Size Optimization Tricks (2022) (64 points | 21 comments)
28. NYC Congestion Pricing Tracker (318 points | 527 comments)
29. Battle Scenes depicted in moving pictures before CGI (30 points | 31 comments)
30. First live birth using Fertilo procedure that matures eggs outside the body (95 points | 71 comments)
